name: Destruction or non-availability of repository site
description: Repository’s physical premises are destroyed or rendered permanently or temporarily unusable.
notes:
- Are the repository's operational activities undertaken within a single physical building or group of buildings within a small geographical area?
- Are redundant system and storage facilities established? 

The full description of this risk has been obtained from examples provided in DRAMBORA - Digital Repository Audit Method Based on Risk Assessment, March 2007, Digital Curation Centre (DCC) and Digital Preservation Europe (DPE), http://www.repositoryaudit.eu/
preMitigationNotes:
- Fire damage
- Asbestos found within building
mitigationStrategy:
Avoidance strategies:
- Maintain, test and revise physical and software system security policies in accordance with relevant standards In the event of risk’s execution:
- Establish redundant storage facilities capable of becoming operational base
identifiedBy: DRAMBORA - Digital Repository Audit Method Based on Risk Assessment
